title: "Honda's Elite S wins recognition as best business plane in its class"
excerpt: "Greensboro-based Honda Aircraft Company’s new HondaJet Elite S was named the Best Light Jet in the luxury-lifestyle magazine Robb Report’s 34th Best of the Best issue. The jet won a 2007 Best of the Best award when it was an experimental aircraft."
